verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: called] [ARG1: former CIA Director John Brennan and former director of National Intelligence James Clapper] [ARG2: " liars and leakers] . " Now , he is using them to sing his CIA pick 's praises .
